findings.problemShort: documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation
findings.solutionShort: ensure each html document contains a non-empty <title> element
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation on /

pullRequest.title: [WIP] Fix accessibility issue for missing <title> element

findings.problemShort: document should have one main landmark
findings.solutionShort: ensure the document has a main landmark
findings.solutionLong:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Document should have one main landmark on /

pullRequest.title: [WIP] Fix accessibility issue by adding main landmark

findings.problemShort: page should contain a level-one heading
findings.solutionShort: ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
findings.solutionLong:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Page should contain a level-one heading on /

pullRequest.title: [WIP] Fix accessibility issue: add level-one heading on page
